statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_date, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiments ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE user_id = 5 AND sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT id, post_date FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiments WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM social_media_sentiments GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.6 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts, DATE(post_date) AS post_day FROM social_media_sentiments GROUP BY post_day HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY post_day ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data
SELECT post_content, sentiment_analysis FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM social_media_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, MAX(sentiment_analysis) AS highest_sentiment FROM social_media_data GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM consumer_preferences
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_analysis > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY sentiment_analysis DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(sentiment_analysis) as average_sentiment FROM social_media_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT post_content, user_id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data INNER JOIN consumer_preferences ON social_media_data.user_id = consumer_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_posts FROM social_media_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT id, post_text, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaData;
SELECT sentiment_score, post_text, id FROM SocialMediaData;
SELECT sentiment_score, post_text FROM SocialMediaData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ConsumerSentiment WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, preference_score FROM ConsumerPreferences WHERE product_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaData WHERE post_text LIKE '%positive%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, sentiment_score FROM ConsumerSentiment WHERE sentiment_category = 'happy' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) as product_count FROM ConsumerPreferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING product_count > 3;
SELECT user_id, SUM(preference_score) as total_preference_score FROM ConsumerPreferences GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_preference_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, gender, age FROM user_demographics WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT product_id, review_text, rating FROM product_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username, post FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT user_id, gender, age, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT review_id, product_id, review_text, rating FROM product_reviews WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis JOIN user_demographics ON social_media_sentiment_analysis.id = user_demographics.user_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_type, sentiment_value FROM social_media_posts JOIN consumer_sentiments ON social_media_posts.post_id = consumer_sentiments.post_id;
SELECT post_text, engagement_type, engagement_date FROM social_media_posts JOIN post_engagement ON social_media_posts.post_id = post_engagement.post_id ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT post_text, sentiment_type, sentiment_value FROM social_media_posts JOIN consumer_sentiments ON social_media_posts.post_id = consumer_sentiments.post_id WHERE sentiment_type = 'positive' ORDER BY sentiment_value DESC
SELECT user_name, user_location, user_email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_location = 'New York' ORDER BY user_name

SELECT post_text, preference_type, preference_value FROM social_media_posts JOIN consumer_preferences ON social_media_posts.post_id = consumer_preferences.post_id WHERE preference_type = 'food' ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT post_text, post_date, engagement_type, user_name FROM social_media_posts JOIN post_engagement ON social_media_posts.post_id = post_engagement.post_id JOIN user_profiles ON post_engagement.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY post_date DESC
